lead_paragraph: Frenchman Ian Mahinmi has spent most of his NBA career in the shadows, relatively speaking, but on Saturday he enjoyed a turn in the spotlight.

headline.print_headline: Frenchman Mahinmi Has Career Game for Pacers
headline.main: Frenchman Mahinmi Has Career Game for Pacers
